snippet: BERLIN, Feb. 2--Adolf Hitler has lost weight and is slightly more nervous than at the outbreak of the war, five months ago tomorrow, but Nazi leaders say he is in the best of health....

headline.main: Hitler, Thinner, Shows Nerve Strain of War; Works 15 to 16 Hours a Day at Chancellery

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Feb. 2--Adolf Hitler has lost weight and is slightly more nervous than at the outbreak of the war, five months ago tomorrow, but Nazi leaders say he is in the best of health.
